beer.beer_description:
Interim name: Gatekeeper Golden Ale.
English Pale malts coupled with Challenger and Goldings hops provide the bitterness and aroma. The result is a highly distinctive light, golden ale, with caramel aromas, a pleasing toffee apple flavour and a late bitterness.
Draft = 4.0%, Bottle = 4.7%

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 30 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 7!

user.bio: Is it wrong for this app to speak to me and tell me where to go? Worse that I listen? Cheers to Mr. Avola.
“Here’s to alcohol: the cause of, and solution to, all of life’s problems.” -- Homer Simpson
A beer a day helps you work rest and play
Ticking off pubs and discovering new ales. Also on Cask Marque. Instagram - findmeinthepub2022
user.location: Stevenage, UK - supports LOSC & Winnipeg Jets, Stevenage FC

items.checkin_comment: Приятно. Хмельной аромат, мягкий вкус. Годно

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 140 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 29!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 15 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
Drinking with friends is fun. Right? You've checked in with at least 4 other people within 2 hours.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
